portfolio: From Quelques Aspects de la Vie de Paris (Some Scenes of Parisian Life), 1899
text: In this scene of busy rush-hour traffic, Bonnard captures the feeling of individual isolation in a crowd.  The pedestrians rush past one another with their heads down or lost in their own private thoughts and concerns.
title: Place le soir
